name: Eleutheria
description:
Two undead beings contemplate death, rebirth, alienation, transformation, and trust.

This is another short game made to get more familiar with some new tools: namely, some of Freya Campbell’s Twitsy template. (Ironically enough, there is no Bitsy in this piece.)

Features:
  • 👁️ Play entirely using your keyboard!
  • 👁️ PRESS SPACE to advance dialogue and narration, and PRESS 1, 2, or 3 to select choices
  • 👁️ Audio with volume control
  • 👁️ Undo/redo buttons
  • 👁️ 10-15 min on average
  • 👁️ Branching dialogue with subtly different endings
  • 👁️ Illustrations
  • 👁️ Emotional baggage

Part of a series containing:
  • 👁️ Augur & Haruspex
  • 👁️ Hatchling
